name: Covid Vaccination
details: We provide covid vaccine free for all people. In order to get that they have to register through a website. Then they will get a msg with a date. In that particular date, they will get their covid vaccine

name: Free Medicine
details: We provide governent's free medicine for the poor people. So the overall treatment cost is minimised

name: Ambulance
details: Our system has a ambulance service. We provide driver's phone number so that anyone can call them in time of need.

name: Telemedicine
details: We have a telemedicine Service. During the lockdown period this process was vary much helpful.

name: Altrasonography
details: We have our own altrasonogram. So people don't need to rush.

name: X-rays
details: We have our own x-ray machine. It's price is also very cheap so that al kinds of people get the service easily.
